action.text: Motion to table amendment SA 1287 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 53 - 47. Record Vote Number: 18.
Amendment SA 1287 proposed by Senator Schumer. (consideration: CR S406, S406-412; text: CR S406) To subpoena John Michael "Mick" Mulvaney.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1287 proposed by Senator Schumer.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to table amendment SA 1287 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 53 - 47. Record Vote Number: 18.
